statements: SELECT * FROM contracts WHERE contract_type='Standard';
SELECT contract_id, supplier_id, start_date, end_date FROM contracts WHERE supplier_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT amount FROM contracts WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT contract_id, contract_type, start_date, end_date FROM contracts WHERE supplier_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND end_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM contracts WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM contracts WHERE contract_type = 'Electricity' AND amount > 1000 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT contract_id, start_date, end_date FROM contracts WHERE supplier_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY end_date;
SELECT supplier_id, energy_buyer_id, amount FROM contracts WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM contracts WHERE supplier_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001' OR amount < 5000 ORDER BY amount ASC;
SELECT contract_id, contract_type, start_date, end_date FROM contracts WHERE amount >= 5000 AND end_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, email_address FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_type FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_type = 'Manufacturer' ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM energy_buyers WHERE contract_expiry > '2022-12-31';
SELECT buyer_name, purchase_volume FROM energy_buyers ORDER BY purchase_volume DESC;
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_type = 'Manufacturer';
SELECT supplier_name, email_address FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_type = 'Distributor' ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_type FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_name LIKE 'S%' AND supplier_type = 'Retailer';
SELECT * FROM suppliers s JOIN energy_buyers b ON s.supplier_id = b.buyer_id WHERE b.purchase_volume > 1000;

SELECT supplier_name, email_address, buyer_name, contract_expiry FROM suppliers s JOIN energy_buyers b ON s.supplier_id = b.buyer_id WHERE s.supplier_type = 'Distributor' AND b.buyer_type = 'Business';
SELECT * FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name ASC
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_contact FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1
SELECT buyer_name FROM energy_buyers WHERE buyer_location = 'California'
SELECT * FROM contracts ORDER BY contract_end_date DESC
SELECT supplier_id, COUNT(contract_id) AS total_contracts FROM contracts GROUP BY supplier_id
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_contact FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 2
SELECT supplier_id, COUNT(*) AS total_contracts FROM contracts GROUP BY supplier_id HAVING total_contracts > 5
SELECT buyer_name, buyer_location, contract_amount FROM energy_buyers INNER JOIN contracts ON energy_buyers.buyer_id = contracts.buyer_id

SELECT supplier_name, buyer_name, contract_amount, contract_start_date FROM suppliers JOIN contracts ON suppliers.supplier_id = contracts.supplier_id JOIN energy_buyers ON contracts.buyer_id = energy_buyers.buyer_id
SELECT * FROM contracts WHERE contract_value > 10000;
SELECT supplier_id, COUNT(*) AS num_contracts FROM contracts GROUP BY supplier_id;
SELECT contract_date, contract_value FROM contracts WHERE buyer_id = 1 ORDER BY contract_date DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_location LIKE '%Valley%';
SELECT buyer_name, buyer_location FROM energy_buyers WHERE buyer_location = 'California' ORDER BY buyer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM contracts WHERE contract_value > 10000 ORDER BY contract_date DESC;
SELECT contract_id, supplier_id, buyer_id, contract_date, contract_value FROM contracts WHERE buyer_id = 1;

SELECT contracts.contract_id, suppliers.supplier_name, energy_buyers.buyer_name, contracts.contract_date, contracts.contract_value FROM contracts JOIN suppliers ON contracts.supplier_id = suppliers.supplier_id JOIN energy_buyers ON contracts.buyer_id = energy_buyers.buyer_id;
SELECT farm_name, farm_location, COUNT(contract_id) AS total_contracts FROM wind_farms LEFT JOIN contracts ON wind_farms.farm_id = contracts.supplier_id GROUP BY wind_farms.farm_id;

SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location, AVG(contract_value) AS avg_contract_value FROM suppliers JOIN contracts ON suppliers.supplier_id = contracts.supplier_id GROUP BY supplier_name, supplier_location ORDER BY avg_contract_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM suppliers ORDER BY name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT name, contact_email FROM energy_buyers WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM contracts WHERE start_date <= '2023-01-01';
SELECT id, event_date FROM agreement_history WHERE event_description LIKE '%termination%';
SELECT name, location, capacity FROM wind_farms ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, contact_email FROM suppliers WHERE contact_name IS NOT NULL;
SELECT contracts.start_date, contracts.amount FROM contracts INNER JOIN suppliers ON contracts.supplier_id = suppliers.id;
SELECT energy_buyers.name, contracts.amount FROM energy_buyers INNER JOIN contracts ON energy_buyers.id = contracts.energy_buyer_id WHERE contracts.amount > 10000;
SELECT * FROM wind_farms ORDER BY commission_date DESC;
